name: Frogalyptic
description: This project was made 3 years ago in a 6-hour gamejam. I thought I should upload it to itch.io to display as a project. It's an old and very simple game so there's no menuing or options. The art and music was not made by me. The background sprites are from this package: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/free-pixel-space-platform-pa.... The frog was made by a game art student, and the music by two music technology students.
